bill.title: Regards post-diagnostics-prison guard exposed to bodily fluids
bill.description: To amend sections 4113.21, 4123.026, 4123.52, 4123.56, 4123.58, 4123.65, and 4123.66 and to enact section 4121.471 of the Revised Code regarding employee medical examinations and changes to the Worker's Compensation Law.
